item.title: Image denoising Using CNN
item.description:
This project was a done in Gujarat Industrial hackathon conducted on march 21 2019. In this project, I have desined a machine learning model to improve the video quality of the surveillance camera at night.

I had used python programming language to implement the project.Moreover, I worked with computer vision libraries of python to implement a Convolution Neural Network (CNN). I trained the model by processing every frame of a video footage and then denoising it. This result in a clerified video which can be use by police in case of any emergency.
